findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The 'onlyOwner' modifier is used in functions changeGetFeeOnSell, setIsTimelockExempt and setAutomatedMarketMakerPair, which may allow an authorized owner to upgrade scripts without proper validation.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The mint function allows creation of a specified number of tokens and adds it to the total supply without any limitations, potentially leading to an unlimited increase in token supply.

findings.title: Locking or pausing all or some function modules of the smart contract
findings.description: The smart contract owner can lock or pause certain function modules, such as antibot and blacklist, which may lead to elevated risks of out-of-gas and potential resource exhaustion errors.

findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: DecentraBNB's smart contract has an active ownership which creates a risk of rug pull scams and centralization hacks.
